text: @RealCandaceO If her family is knowingly going along with the bogus death listing of Covid19, then is quite possible that they have been forced into it for insurance reasons. Is it likely that they were "Approached" CDC, W.H.O., Bill Gates, all of the The Globalist,  are stooping to his level!
